apply.title: Apply
apply.description: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional three-month course for the developer beginners, build their competence through trainings and individual or group assignments.

admission.title: Pass the admission
admission.description: Registration is available for candidates who are willing to pass the entry exam. Results define a list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into the academy.

learn.title: Learn from the experts
learn.description: Students will learn the latest technologies and how to create software using the best tools on the market. Devbridge assigns a mentor to each student to serve as a resource for their development projects.

company.title: Join the company
company.description: At the end of term all students will receive recognition for completing the course and top students may receive job offers from Devbridge.
